name: Capital Cities v1.3
description:
Want to learn about your capital cities in a fun and enjoyable way? Look no further.
 3 Choices. 3 Flags. 3 Lives.

Capital Cities is an educational game currently in development,  created by TiltedAngle. You get three flags and one capital city for each question. You must match the capital city to the flag of the country it is in. If you get one question wrong, you lose a life. If you lose all three lives, the game is over.

This is the latest version.

What's new

  • Changed Uzbekistan, Turkey and Pakistan’s flag to include a symmetrical crescent moon
  • Changed Tajikistan’s flag to include non-curved stars 
  •  Changed Tonga’s capital city from ukuʻalofa to Nuku’alofa 
  •  Home icon changed 
  •  Added Caribbean islands 
  •  Added North Pacific islands 
  •  Kosovo and Taiwan are included in the country rotation.
  • 30 more flags added

Released on 2nd June
